category.name: Product Structure.CAD BOM Alignment
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: FND0_COPY_PART_PROP_TO_DESIGN
preference.preference_description: Enable the functionality to copy properties from Part BOM Line to Design BOM Line on Alignment. Values will have format of Part_Property_name : Design_Property_name where Part_Property_name value from PartBOMLine will be copied to Design_Property_name value from DesignBOMLine. In case of invalid value format properties will not get copied and the operation of Alignment will continue.
